text: The men's 4 × 400 metres relay event at the 1970 Summer Universiade was held at the Stadio Comunale in Turin on 6 September 1970. ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=65% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 1970 Summer Universiade |- |World record | |2:56.2 |Mexico City, Mexico |20 October 1968 |- |Universiade record | |3:06.7 |Tokyo, Japan |1967 |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Athletes !! Time !! title: Athletics at the 1970 Summer Universiade – Men's 4 × 400 metres relay
